nodes.message: Kneeling for this whole chest, since it's a bit weird to get kneel up and down all the time

nodes.text: Hey, there's a chest in here!
The treasure kind of chest. Not someone's ribcage.
It's locked. I'm not surprised. It's not much of a treasure chest if anyone can open it.
Yep. It's still locked.
Ha! Would you look at that!
Okay, there is a really ugly pair of flannel pants with panda designs on it.
Why would anyone make magical pants? Okay, so it has a strong protection spell on it... It's surprisingly good armor for defense.
And they do, indeed, have extra protection against pandas.
The downside is that it makes you look like a clown and no one would ever take you seriously when you are wearing them. That, and they have a soft glow that would make it hard to be stealthy.
Even if these pants are magical, I'd look really silly wearing them.
This is perfect for a particular pirate Poobah game!
Let's see... there are about a hundred coins in here.
And a gold ring with the words, "For my One and Only" inscribed on it.
There's nothing left to loot and pillage here.
Hmmm... this is a Columbo type lock. It's devious and takes methodical concentration to open it.
I can't quite tell what kind of lock this it, but it looks complex.
I can tell that this is a tough lock.
Good thing I have my Houdini. Now all it takes is some skill...
Got it!
It was a really, really tough lock.
Clearly, I need more lockpicking practice...
I really need some kind of special tool to open this... and a lot of tool use skill.
I could see if the Captain's Skeleton Key will fit this lock...
Yes! It works.
